officialTitle: Examining the Decision-Making Process and Characteristics of Cancer Patients Who Sought Second Opinions at the University of Colorado
conditions: Breast Cancer, Pancreatic Cancer, Colorectal Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Second opinion retention rates for cancer patients at University of Colorado
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Cancer patients who are 18 years of age or older who received a second opinion at the University of Colorado.
* A subset of these patients will be invited to participate in semi-structured interviews

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients under the age of 18.
* Patients who did not receive a second opinion at the University of Colorado.
